text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo Basically about how "hey, guess what....Military was good all along, good thing Hep-C Vaccine's are mandatory..." ....whoever was Hep-C vaccinated and contracted Covid-19 is who really needs to be studied for "whats different"..... #GoHepC
